caption: Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary defines schema attributes and includes references to the events and objects in which they are used.
name: dictionary

auid.caption: Audit User ID
auid.description: The audit user assigned at login by the audit subsystem.

euid.caption: Effective User ID
euid.description: The effective user under which this process is running.

egid.caption: Effective Group ID
egid.description: The effective group under which this process is running.

linux_kernel_info.caption: Linux Kernel Information
linux_kernel_info.description: Details about the kernel running on the Linux endpoint.

kernel_release.caption: Kernel Release
kernel_release.description: The kernel release of the operating system. Determined from the uname -r command output on Unix-based systems.

kernel_version_first.caption: Kernel Version First
kernel_version_first.description: The first number of the kernel version. Given the full version is w.x.y-z-<release>, the kernel version first is w.

kernel_version_second.caption: Kernel Version Second
kernel_version_second.description: The second number of the kernel version. Given the full version is is w.x.y-z-<release>, the kernel version second is x.

kernel_version_third.caption: Kernel Version Third
kernel_version_third.description: The third number of the kernel version. Given the full version is is w.x.y-z-<release>, the kernel version third is y.

kernel_version_fourth.caption: Kernel Version Fourth
kernel_version_fourth.description: The fourth number of the kernel version. Given the full version is is w.x.y-z-<release>, the kernel version fourth is z.
